price: Hiyo ni chemchem iliyo humo inaitwa Salsabil.
footnotes: Hiyo ni kutokana na chemchem ya Peponi inayo itwa Salsabil, kwa sababu ya wepesi wa unywaji wake na uzuri wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
